episodes.title: My experience with a Scientology auditing session as a child -- Story time with Samuel the SP Chef
episodes.description:
This is en extract from a longer video that I did. In this part I talk about the time when I was eleven or twelve and was audited by a man doing the TRs & Objectives Course (renamed and republished as The Survival Rundown).
Needless to say as it so often is when a child is involved in a Scientology session, it did not go well and was very traumatizing for me.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Scientology's Training Routines TR6 --TR9
episodes.description:
This is en extract from a longer video that I did. In this part I talk about and explain the infamous TRs (Training Routines). Here I take on the so called Upper Indoc.(trination) from TR6 up to the last TR9.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Scientology's Training Routine OT TR0 -- TR4
episodes.description:
This is en extract from a longer video that I did. In this part I talk about and explain the infamous TRs (Training Routines) from the first of OT TR0 up to TR4.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Scientology's TRs and Objectives
episodes.description:
Here I explain the course TRs and Objectives, although I focus more on the TRs (Training Routines) which is one of the many steps of Scientologys Bridge to total Freedom. 
I also talk about my own experience with this kind of auditing as a child and how that bad experience has effected my childhood and life after it.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

New info that I have received from my subscribers: TRs and objectives is now called ´´Survival Rundown``

episodes.title: A brief look at Scientology's Bridge to total freedom
episodes.description:
I take a brief and nonacademic look at the so called Bridge to total freedom from Scientology.

If you'd like to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: The Scientology Cadet Organisation UK -- Story time with Samuel the SP Chef
episodes.description:
From 2005 - 2008 I was in the Sea Org Cadet Org and attended the Walsh manor School. Here I talk about my schedule, the kind of work that I did and my education from the age of 13 - 16.
I was there when in 2007 there was an inspection of the school and I look at the subsequent report of that inspection.




If you want to read the full report of the inspection, you will find it here.
Walsh Manor School inspection Report:

https://files.ofsted.gov.uk/v1/file/865557

episodes.title: Update on my Disconnection part 2
episodes.description:
My Sister and brother in law send me a Knowledge Report and after confronting him about it, they disconnected from me and blocked my phone Number.
I now have tried to actually ´´handle`` my problem with Scientology and after many phone calls I was advised to write a letter... and so I did.
let's see how long it will take them to respond.

If you'd like to get in tough with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Update on my Disconnection Part 1
episodes.description:
My Sister and brother in law send me a Knowledge Report and after confronting him about it, they disconnected from me and blocked my phone Number.
After some thought I decided to do a phone call with my local Org, to ´´handle`` my KR. Unfortunately it was more then just one call...

If you'd like to get in tough with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Where do St  Hill SO Members live and sleep -- Story time with Samuel The SP Chef
episodes.description:
I am looking at the property of Walsh Manor, where the Sea Org Members of St. Hill Manor live and sleep. I lived at this property from 2005 until I left the Sea Org in 2012.

If you'd like to get in tough with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Meeting David Miscavige the leader of Scientology -- Story time with Samuel The SP Chef
episodes.description:
With 13, while I as working for Scientology as a Cadet at St. Hill in England I met Scientology leader David Miscavige... unfortunately I did not know who he was.

If you'd like to get in tough with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: (D) Scientology Schulen in der Schweiz -- Geschichtsstunde von einem Sektenkind (D)
episodes.description:
Ich erzähle über meine Schulzeit von 2003 bis 2005 (Alter: 11 bis 13) wo ich zwei Scientology Schulen in der Schweiz besuchte. Die Privatschule Sandra Planzer, die auch in 2003 geschlossen worden ist wegen ihre Scientology Methoden im Unterricht und die ZIEL Schule in Zürich, die heute immer noch offen ist und Schüler unterrichtet.

Hier den Artikel von dem Beobachter:
https://www.beobachter.ch/gesetze-recht/scientology-urteil-macht-nicht-schule-11505

Falls ihr mich direkt kontaktieren möchte, dann schreibt mir doch bitte eine E-mail an:
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: (D) Ich bin ein Sektenkind von Scientology (D)
episodes.description:
Ich erzähle meine Geschichte als Scientology Sektenkind, wie ich mit neun Jahren einen Vertrag unterschrieben habe um für den Rest meines Leben und für die nächsten Milliarden Jahre für Scientology zu arbeiten.
Wie ich dann mit 13 nach England gebracht worden bin um dort meine Pflichten des Vertrags war zu nehmen.
Ich erzähle über meine Schwierigkeiten als schwuler Mann in dieser Sekte zu sein und meine versuche ´´mein Leben zu löschen`` durch den enormen Selbsthass den ich für mich hatte. über meine Zeit, nachdem ich die Scientology Arbeit verliess in 2012 und wie ich nach fünf Jahren endlich aus meiner eigenen Gehirnwäscherei in 2017 komplett kam und ich mich als Ex-Scientologen beschreiben konnte.

Falls ihr mich direkt kontaktieren möchte, dann schreibt mir doch bitte eine E-mail an:
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: The greater good in Scientology
episodes.description:
What is the greater good in Scientology and what are the eight dynamics of life and how are they used to justify the behavior of Scientology and Scientologists?
I'm having a brief look at that, my own understanding and experience as an Ex Scientologist myself.

If you'd like to get in tough with me directly, then please write me at
thespchef@gmail.com

episodes.title: Interview with Ex Scientologist Samuel Zülli aka The SP Chef  Part 3
episodes.description:
The third and final part of a three part Interview looking at my life growing up in Scientology, signing a billion-year contract at nine years old, being trafficked from Switzerland to England at 13, then joining the Sea Org. My ´´career`` in the Sea Org, the struggles of working for Scientology as a gay man and leaving the Sea Org at 20 and finding my way in life after Scientology. We talk about my mental health and the struggles of life with a Scientology background.
the interview was hosted by the marvelous Jeff from the YouTube channel @ptsforlife back in December 2023

If you want to get in touch with me directly, then please write me at: thespchef@gmail.com

My art on Instagram for the curious amongst you: https://www.instagram.com/kunstatelier_zuellimann/

episodes.title: Growing up as a child in Scientology
episodes.description:
I tell my story of my twisted view of the world having grown up as a Scientologist and how there is no conventional relationship to family.

If you'd like to get in touch with me, please write me an e-mail at thespchef@gmail.com
